title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of green cut and uncut velvet on self-colored satin ground. Design of tiny flowering branches alternately pointing up and down.
